name: bnj1293
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wss(cin(c2, c1), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wss(cin(c2, c1), c1)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
